value:
$WmMPID_比翼ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_FF_Pair,Face|Hmm... The drink stall is over this
way, I think.$k$p$nMPID_マリアンヌ|Ooh. And this is the one that makes
the drink with the rare fruit in it?$k$p$nMPID_比翼ヒルダ|That's right! I saw pictures of it when
I was thumbing through the vacation
guidebook. It looks super cute!$k$p$nMPID_マリアンヌ|Leonie and Mercedes will likely be
thirsty after swimming... I bet they
would love some treats as well.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ヒルダ|You're right—and that's a nice idea.
Especially since things did get a little
awkward with Leonie earlier...$k$pShe just wanted to have some fun
and I shut her down... I could have
been nicer about it.$k$p$nMPID_マリアンヌ|Well, I'm sure everything will be fine
between you. Especially if you bring
them treats.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ヒルダ|Speaking of which, there it is!$k$p...Oh! But their treats are bigger than
I thought! Will we be able to carry
four of them with just the two of us?$k$p$WmMPID_水着アッシュ,ch17_15_Ashe_M_Swim21,Face|Ah! Hello, Hilda, Marianne... Are you
two out shopping?$k$pOh, wow! Those drinks look delicious!$k$p$WmMPID_比翼ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_FF_Pair,Face|Aha! Ashe! What timing!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_比翼ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_FF_Pair,Face|Thank you for carrying all of our
stuff for us, Ashe...$k$p$nMPID_マリアンヌ|S-sorry, Ashe... The treats aren't
too heavy, are they?$k$p$WmMPID_水着アッシュ,ch17_15_Ashe_M_Swim21,Face|No, no. It's fine! You didn't have
to buy me one either. I would have
still helped out, you know.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_FF_Pair,Face|Of course you would! But I wanted
to thank you somehow. I couldn't
make up with Leonie without you!$k$p$Sbs150|
